root: ^even though you usually only do that for first-time encounters.
^Presumably, you've started to become pretty accustomed to this world and your new-found powers.
^This part of the dimension is volatile and uses your emotions to manifest itself in reality and will change as you navigate its path.
^To persevere, you must harness and embrace your individual emotions, channeling them through the crystals one at a time to stabilize the aspects of this dimension.
^"Only through mental fortitude, will you be able to carve out a path for yourself."
